Description: Fit out Estimator. | Joinery Estimator | Royal JoineryAbu Dhabi , Abu Dhabi , United Arab Emirates Royal JoineryJob descriptionRoyal JoineryAs the Fit-out,Joinery Estimator is responsible for accurately estimating the costs associated with joinery and wood factory projects. This role involves analyzing project requirements, conducting material assessments, evaluating production processes, evaluation and gathering market prices and preparing detailed cost estimates.
